reviewText: My students loved reading this book.  I had to order a second DVD because my one autistic student kept getting it to play and severely damaged it.
My pre schoolers loved this DVD.  It really came in handy while teaching about space.  Each video is approximately 12 mins long.
My daughter loves the planet name games and the tunes. However, I wish they have the digital copy and HD.

The Cat in the Hat is always entertaining but especially in space. My daughter loved learning more about outer space with the silly antics of The Cat. This is an entertaining and educational new movie kids will love.

(see full review at [...])
I got this for my granddaughters 4th birthday and she immediately watched it 4 times!
Good educational program for a 1 year old. Up to 5 years of age.

My kids want to watch it over and over again and it is so educational and not annoying. We have never owned one of these Cat in the Hat DVDs before--now I am trying to get as many as I can. I highly recommend it.
My 1st graders loved it! They were singing along and very engaged.
My 3 year old Grandson is enthralled with these programs and is absorbing the contents almost verbatim!

The problem was not the content--it was defective.  It kept skipping and my grandsons were not able to see it in its entirety.  It was very disappointing--to them and to me.
I would like to return it and receive a credit on the card I used to purchase it.
Thank you

We Loved this dvd for the space Unit!
It includes the following episodes
1. Jumping on the Moon
2. No Night Tonight
3. Planet Name Game
4. Top of the Sky
5. Tough Enough

You learn about
- what is gravity
- what causes day and night
- what is the order of planets and more!
Love All Cat in the hat.

... as are all of "The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That" videos.  This is a wonderful tour of the universe, including a visit to all of the planets and much, much more information presented for our 'young people'...
